plan4dial.generate_files.custom_actions.utils¶

Util functions that are useful in custom actions.

Authors: - Rebecca De Venezia

Functions

map_assignment_update(entity, assignment)

Given an entity and its assignment, returns the corresponding update.
plan4dial.generate_files.custom_actions.utils.map_assignment_update(entity: str, assignment: str) → Dict¶

Given an entity and its assignment, returns the corresponding update.

Args: - entity (str): The entity in the update. - assignment (str): The assignment that describes if/how the entity was found.

Returns: - (Dict): The update that corresponds to the entity and assignment provided.
